text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Some facts:
We've tested 1.8% of the population, 42 countries have tested more than us.
With 4% of the world's population, we have 27% of the deaths.
63 000 have died, oh wait, did I say facts? The actual number is probably 100 000.
#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath 

https://t.co/w9wvrUgaTu
